metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7401 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Incorrect interaction of the parse_packet() and parse_part_sign_sha256()functions in network.c in collectd 5.7.1 and earlier allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) of a collectdinstance (configured with "SecurityLevel None" and with empty "AuthFile"options) via a crafted UDP packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7401` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

collectd - 5.7.2-2ubuntu1
collectd-core - 5.7.2-2ubuntu1
collectd-utils - 5.7.2-2ubuntu1
libcollectdclient1 - 5.7.2-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: collectd package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.2-2ubuntu1').
